job_details.full_text:
Legal Tech Engineer

Are you convinced that using legal tech and data science can transform a lawyer's work? Are you curious about the innovation that generative AI can bring to the legal profession? Do you get excited by the prospect of working at a leading law firm, in an international and multidisciplinary team and working together with the practice to improve our service delivery?

   Then this is the position for you!

   About the position

   As a Legal Tech Engineer, you will be part of the Legal Operations department and form a bridge between legal and technology. Your role is to closely follow legal tech developments and find solutions to improve and/or automate our legal processes. Always in close cooperation with our lawyers and clients to guarantee the best result.

   We offer you a very diverse position in which you will be involved in a wide range of projects and topics, such as AI, knowledge management, document automation, client portals, etc. Your role will consist of:
     * Provide advice and support for both our lawyers and clients on how to optimise the processes in their matter by deploying the right tools;
     * Manage and further develop these tools and processes, together with our suppliers and the practice, to ensure that we always provide the best possible solution;
     * Collaborate with lawyers, clients and colleagues from other areas of expertise and departments (e.g., data science, IT etc.) to map legal processes, identify bottlenecks or areas for improvement, and propose concrete solutions;
     * Investigate the opportunities of new technological developments for our practice, e.g., in legal tech, AI, knowledge management and data science;
     * Stimulate the use of tools and new ways of working in our organisation, including giving presentations on the possibilities and providing training for users.
       Who are you?
       You
       - are curious, entrepreneurial, service- and customer-oriented

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on applying existing legal tech and AI tools to improve legal processes rather than developing novel AI models or building AI-powered applications from scratch. While it mentions AI and data science, the core responsibilities revolve around advising, managing, and optimizing the use of these tools for legal professionals, which aligns with using AI to enhance productivity and workflows rather than core AI engineering roles like ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer. The emphasis is on bridging legal and technology, and improving service delivery through existing solutions.

job_tasks.justification: The role requires understanding legal processes, identifying bottlenecks, and aligning technological solutions with the needs of lawyers and clients to improve service delivery.
The role involves understanding the business context of a law firm and how technology can be applied to legal work.
The engineer needs to understand the strategic goals of the law firm and how to leverage technology to achieve them.
job_tasks.phrase: improve and/or automate our legal processes

job_tasks.justification: The role requires understanding the specific needs of lawyers and clients to provide effective technological solutions.
job_tasks.phrase: optimise the processes in their matter

job_tasks.justification: The engineer must collaborate with stakeholders to understand legal processes and identify areas for improvement.
job_tasks.phrase: map legal processes, identify bottlenecks or areas for improvement

job_tasks.justification: The job mentions investigating opportunities in AI and data science, which implies working with or understanding AI models, though not necessarily building them from scratch.
job_tasks.phrase: Investigate the opportunities of new technological developments for our practice, e.g., in legal tech, AI, knowledge management and data science

job_tasks.justification: The role involves managing and developing tools and processes, which can include aspects of software development, especially in integrating and maintaining legal tech solutions.
job_tasks.phrase: Manage and further develop these tools and processes

job_tasks.justification: The position involves deploying the right tools to optimize legal processes, which can include the implementation and integration of software solutions.
The role involves managing and further developing tools and processes, which includes ensuring they provide the best possible solution, implying maintenance and operational oversight.
job_tasks.phrase: ensure that we always provide the best possible solution

job_tasks.justification: The engineer will stimulate the use of tools and new ways of working, including providing training, which involves operationalizing and supporting the adoption of technology.
job_tasks.phrase: Stimulate the use of tools and new ways of working in our organisation, including giving presentations on the possibilities and providing training for users.
